name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Sales Engineer with 8 years of hands-on experience in **Cloud Technologies** including **AWS**, **Google Cloud Services**, and **Microsoft Windows Server**. Expertise in building solutions leveraging **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **RESTful API** integrations to drive customer success and technical sales excellence. Proficient in **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration, ensuring seamless deployment of applications in cloud environments.

In addition to strong technical acumen, I possess a solid understanding of database management with **MS SQL Server**, **Oracle**, and **PostgreSQL**, enabling me to support complex data architectures. My background in **Linux** and **z/OS** guarantees a comprehensive grasp of diverse operating environments, enhancing my capability in delivering tailored solutions to clients across various sectors. Skilled in collaborating with stakeholders and leveraging my expertise in healthcare and financial technologies to provide insightful solutions that align with business objectives.
